description: A creamy, crunchy and fruity dessert.
name: Non-traditional Strawberry Cheesecake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large lemon, keep the zest and juice
25g strawberries, washed, hulled and lightly mashed

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare a muffin tin by lightly rubbing with canola oil. In a mixing bowl, prepare the base by blending the walnuts, lemon zest, macadamia and dates together.

Scoop the mixture from the blender and pack into the bottom of the muffin tins and allow to set in the fridge. While the base is setting, blend the rest of the other ingredients together apart from the strawberries.

Once they are combined fully, lightly mix the strawberries in and then pour the mixture into the muffin tins on top of the base. Allow the total mix to set in the fridge for a minimum of 2 hours before serving.
